section.title: GLFWgamepadstate Struct Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: This describes the input state of a gamepad.

section.section:
Member Data Documentation
axes axesGLFWgamepadstate GLFWgamepadstateaxes
float GLFWgamepadstate::axes
The states of each gamepad axis, in the range -1.0 to 1.0 inclusive.
buttons buttonsGLFWgamepadstate GLFWgamepadstatebuttons
unsigned char GLFWgamepadstate::buttons
The states of each gamepad button, GLFW_PRESS or GLFW_RELEASE.
